subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Somehow the Mets’ pennantless decade has become identified as the Carlos Beltran era. As he is shipped to the Giants, Beltran also became the symbol of failed expectations.
snippet: Somehow the Mets’ pennantless decade has become identified as the Carlos Beltran era. As he is shipped to the Giants, Beltran also became the symbol of failed expectations.
